CustomField.description: The goal title is either written automatically by the “New Goal”, “Edit Goal” or “Revise Goal” flow in case a certain standard goal was selected. In this case, the value from the selected standard goal is copied. If the standard goal contains a placeholder, the replacement value will also be inserted. If the standard goal is set to “-- enter goal manually --", the goal title is entered manually.
CustomField.label: Goal Title
